name: harmonic-analysis-demo
description: Independent demo for harmonic analysis library

scripts.backend: cd backend && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8010 --reload --access-log --log-level info
scripts.stop: npm run backend:stop && npm run frontend:stop
scripts.frontend:stop: lsof -ti:3010 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || pkill -f "node.*start" || pkill -f "webpack" || true
